package.name: HalFiPad
package.shortDescription: Modern gestures, iPad features, and many unique features but lightweight and less battery drain.

descriptionlist.description: This is an package will full depictions.

Features:
* iPhone X gestures (include Only Left, Only Right). * Miniature(similar iPhone X gestures): Reduce the ability to switch applications quickly when swiping left or right on the bottom edge. * Edge Protect (double swipe to gesture). * Status Bar: iPad, iPhone X, Calibrate, and Regular. * Battery Percentage with many options to customize. * Bottom Inset, Rounded Dock, AppSwitcher, Screen Corner. * Home Bar with many options to customize. * CC Animation, CC Grabber, CC Status Bar. * Screenshot buttons combination like iPhone X. * Lockscreen Shortcuts. * No Breadcrumbs. * iPad features: Floating Dock, Split View/Slide Over, Landscape App Style, New Grid Switcher, Picture in Picture. * Dark Keyboard, Higher Keyboard (with height custom), Non-Latin Keyboard (fix conflict right padding), No Gesture When Keyboard. * Camera UI (beta), Zoom and Flip Control like iPhone 11. * FaceID + Padlock Animation. * Fast Open App. * Landscape Orientation Lock. * Make SB Clean. * More Icon Dock. * No Dock Background. * No Icons Fly. * Reduce Rows. * Swipe To Screenshot: Two fingers at once swipe down from the status bar. * Per-App Customize.
